VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Guardians of the Garments
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Apparel wear rate is decreased by 10%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The {0} understand the necessity of clothing for protection, comfort, and self-expression, so they take care to keep their apparel intact.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Makers of Endless Merriment
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Recreation tolerance drops by +2% per day.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The people of {0} cherish every opportunity to play, relax, and even enjoy the quiet moments, no matter how repetitious it may get.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Thieves of Opulence
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Pilfering stealth is increased by +0.2, enabling pickpocketing and burglary.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The people of {0} know that you can't always get what you want for a fair price. Stealing isn't wrong, if you have a good reason for it.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Travelers in Silence
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The people of {0} chart the safest and most hidden routes, and know never to make a sound when traveling.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Agents of Ruin
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Damage against buildings is increased by 20%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The warriors of {0} are trained in identifying structural weakpoints, enabling them to demolish buildings with ease.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Reverent Devotees
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Ideoligious moods and opinions are 25% stronger.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The people of {0} extol the virtues of their ideoligious teachings.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Tenets of Power
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: Secrets gleaned from observing the anima trees are shared among the people of {0}, allowing their psycasters to cultivate a fraction of the mystic energies within themselves.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Zealots of the Faith
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: The effects of ideoligious abilities last 10% longer.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The inhabitants of {0} practice their traditions with utmost zeal. The effects of ideoligious abilities last longer on them.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Cousins of the Dryads
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Gauranlen trees can produce 25% more dryads.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: In {0}, the symbiosis between human and dryad is revered. They tend the gauranlen trees with great care, enabling dryad populations to bloom.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Excellent Teachers
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Instructive ability is increased by 15%, making teaching more effective.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The people of {0} know that a proper education is essential for a life well-lived, so they strive to be the most effective teachers they can be.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Demon Slayers
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Damage against unnatural entities is increased by 20%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The hunters of {0} collect lore on the weaknesses of Void entities, and they view the destruction of such monsters as a sacred duty.
